holidays.title: Are You Okay Day
holidays.description: Are You Okay Day is observed to make us and those around us seen, heard, and understood.

holidays.title: Martyrdom of Imam Hassan Asgari
holidays.description: No one should be persecuted for their religious beliefs. Take a stand against religious intolerance.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Milkshake Day
holidays.description: Simple, sweet, and delectable, chocolate milkshakes are one of the best treats of all time.

holidays.title: National Day of Encouragement
holidays.description: Do your bit to uplift those around you.

holidays.title: National Police Woman Day
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate all the brave women in our police force.

holidays.title: National Report Medicare Fraud Day
holidays.description: Every year, America loses 10% of Medicare funds to fraud.

holidays.title: National School Picture Day
holidays.description: School picture day is one that kids eagerly look forward to, and with good reason!

holidays.title: United Nations Day for South-South Cooperation
holidays.description: Stand for unity in the south by observing the United Nations Day for South-South Cooperation.

holidays.title: 2 Chainz’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no limiting this talented rapper — the world is his oyster!

holidays.title: Bizzy Bone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Having overcome some of life’s toughest challenges, this rapper has earned his fame.

holidays.title: Emmy Rossum’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is unquestionably a gifted actress and singer who has won numerous awards.

holidays.title: Hans Zimmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: By prioritizing the idea of simple compositions, his works are easily attached to the ears.

holidays.title: Jennifer Hudson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This phenomenal singer and actress continues to build a legacy that is bound to outlive her.

holidays.title: Paul Walker’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor can rest in peace knowing his legacy makes the world better and brighter.

holidays.title: RM’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper, songwriter, and bandleader is outstanding in every way that matters!

holidays.title: Sydney Sweeney’s Birthday
holidays.description: This beautiful actress was dubbed “the scariest girl on T.V.” by the “New York Times.”

holidays.title: Zackary Arthur’s Birthday
holidays.description: We can hardly wait to see what the future holds for this talented young star.
